commit_list.message:
Make #setup_http accept a URI argument and return the http connection.
Make #setup_https accept an http connection.
Change #setup to use the new #setup_http and setup_https methods.
Make #call_service use the new #service_http and #service_uri methods.
The new #service_uri method checks for and calls (if it exists) the #service_port method. This gives subclasses an opportunity to use the WSDL defined ports and optionally modify them.
